Articles.Content:
I am new to the forum but have been lurking and playing KSP for about Two years. I'm good at most of the game, although 1.0+ aero did have a learning curve. I general play career mode just to see how it's progressing. I generally haven't flown planes, except in sandbox. I use KER and KAC. MJ was helpful for a time.

Hopefully I can be an asset to the Forum.

I have enjoyed learning from the members and the youtubers.

Thanks, I hope to pay it forward.

Have Fun!!
Hello AlanP and welcome to the forum.

Hello Alan! 1.0 certainly brought some changes, but I'm glad to hear you've been playing for a while. Also glad to see you join the forums (maybe you can share some of that wisdom. )

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
